title: Select an account type
description: Need help? Learn more about account types
legal_form_tooltip_corporation_descripti: The “Company” account is intended and should be created by all legal persons (excluding public sector bodies and non-profit entities) and all natural persons (sole traders) purchasing OVHcloud products as part of their professional activity.
legal_form_tooltip_individual_descriptio: The “Individual” account should only be created by natural persons purchasing OVHcloud products for their private needs, outside the scope of a professional activity.
legal_form_tooltip_administration_descri: The “Public Sector” account should only be created by central government bodies, regional and local authorities, or public sector bodies.
legal_form_tooltip_association_descripti: The “Non-Profit” account should only be created by non-profits and other not-for-profit organisations such as foundations, trade unions or religious congregations.
